description.en: Includes overview of epidemiology, aetiology, clinical manifestations and possibilities of treatment of mental disorders. Target group of the course: doctoral students of curricula Neurosciences and Medicine and Sport.
description.et: Õppeaine annab ülevaate psüühikahäirete epidemioloogiast, etioloogiast, kliinilistest avaldustest ja ravi võimalustest. Õppeaine sihtrühm: õppekavade "Neuroteadused" ja "Meditsiin ja sport" doktorandid.

objectives.en: Purpose of the course is to give basic knowledge of mental disorders.

learning_outcomes.en: After completion the student knows about major mental disorders:
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse lõpetanu teab olulisemate psüühikahäirete kohta alljärgnevat:

learning_outcomes.en: Student is able to assess patient's psychopathology, can explore and describe the mental status of patients.
learning_outcomes.et: Psüühikahäirete uurimismeetodite valdkonnas oskab üliõpilane hinnata patsiendi psühhopatoloogiat ja psüühilisi funktsioone; koostab psüühilise staatuse.

learning_outcomes.en: Student knows from the field of clinical psychology and psychotherapy:
learning_outcomes.et: Kliinilise psühholoogia ja psühhoteraapia valdkonnast teab:

learning_outcomes.en: - psychological explanations and models of mental disorders;

notes.et: The lectures and seminars will take place in the Department of Psychiatry, 31 Raja Str. and in Moodle. More accurate information will be in Moodle.

description.et: Differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present )

grade_preconditions.et: Participation in at least 80% of lectures and seminars.

debt_elimination.et: In agreement with the responsible lecturer.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.recommended_materials:
Cambridge Textbook of Effective Treatments in Psychiatry 2008. Ed. Peter Tyrer and Kenneth R. Silk. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
ICD-10: https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en#/V
ICD-11: https://icd.who.int/browse/2025-01/mms/en
New Oxford Textbook of Psychiatry 2020. Ed. John R. Geddes, Nancy C. Andreasen and Guy M. Goodwin. Oxford: Oxford University Press.
Textbook of Biological Psychiatry 2004. Ed. Jaak Panksepp. Hoboken, N. J.: Wiley-Liss.

description.et: Psychological mechanisms of mental disorders. Major schools of psychotherapy.
Questionnaires and structured interviews in psychiatry.
Affective disorders (depression, bipolar disorder). Anxiety disorders.
Mental disorders due to psychoactive substance use. Sleep disorders.

audience.et: Doctoral students of curricula Neurosciences and Medicine and Sport
